title: Unidad Deportiva 21 de Marzo
text: The Unidad Deportiva 21 de Marzo is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Soledad%20de%20Graciano%20S%C3%A1nchez">Soledad de Graciano Sánchez</a>, <a href="San%20Luis%20Potos%C3%AD">San Luis Potosí</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium for <a href="Santos%20de%20Soledad">Santos de Soledad</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 8,000 people.
